attributes.action: stop the property check charges and intrusion of property inspectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the is not to go ahead it means anybody selling a property from next june will have to pay this charge of £200.00 to have it checked by one of 4,000 new inspectors currently being recruited. These people will be given the legal right to enter our homes.
This is just the start soon valuation officers will be turning up demanding to know what improvements you have made and using this information as a way of calculating charges for council tax even living close to shops bus routes having enclosed gardens etc will add to these charges

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
